title: Classic eggs Florentine with a twist
ingredients: ['4 thick slices ciabatta bread', '25ml olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon dried herbs', 'salt and pepper to taste', '50g butter', '400g baby spinach leaves', '2 to 3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '4 large eggs', '100ml double cream', '100g Port Salut (thinly sliced)', '4 large egg yolks', 'Sprinkle ground nutmeg']
